actions.message: Communism, you say? Seems interesting, let me gather some data...

actions.message: Hmmm. Let me analyze this data...

actions.message:
Welcome to Carolingia, ${tempVars("name")}!
I have sent you a welcoming DM with all the needed information!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Please welcome out new count, ${mentionedUser}! 
${tempVars("name")}, feel free to introduce yourself! We're all friendly here and would love to know more about you!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**WELCOME TO CAROLINGIA!**

We're very happy to see you here! We hope you enjoy your time and have the best experience in the region and Nationstates in general!


**IMPORTANT LINKS:**

GUIDE TO CAROLINGIA: https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1120238
GUIDE TO CAROLINGIA REGIONAL DICORD: https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1120165

USEFUL INFORMATION:

Please check the ``#rules-and-roles`` channel in Carolingia Discord. All the needed information may be found there.
If you need any help, please direct all your questions to a member of the Privy Council.

**ENJOY YOUR STAY!**
actions.name: Send Message
